channel.title: CyberNetSec - Data Breach
channel.description: Latest data breach threat intelligence - the last 10 articles

item.title: Akira Ransomware Gang Hits LG Energy Solution, Claims 1.7TB Data Theft
item.description:
South Korean battery manufacturing giant LG Energy Solution has confirmed it was the victim of a ransomware attack at one of its overseas facilities. The notorious Akira ransomware gang has claimed responsibility for the breach, alleging on its dark web leak site that it stole 1.7 terabytes of data ...

Severity: High

Categories: Ransomware, Data Breach, Cyberattack

Read Full Article →

item.title: Italian IT Firm Almaviva Hit by Cyberattack, 2.3TB of Data Leaked
item.description:
The prominent Italian IT services provider Almaviva has confirmed it was hit by a major cyberattack, resulting in the theft and leaking of nearly 2.3 terabytes of sensitive data. The breach has exposed information from several of Almaviva's clients, most notably Italy's national railway operator, Fe...

Severity: High

Categories: Data Breach, Cyberattack, Supply Chain Attack

Read Full Article →

item.title: Harvard University Data Breach Exposes Donor Information After Phone Phishing Attack
item.description:
Harvard University has disclosed a data breach affecting its Alumni Affairs and Development Office, discovered on November 18, 2025. The incident originated from a phone-based phishing (vishing) attack that gave an unauthorized party access to systems containing personal information and donation rec...

Severity: Medium

Categories: Data Breach, Phishing, Threat Intelligence

item.title: Major Wall Street Banks Exposed After Breach at Mortgage Vendor SitusAMC
item.description:
SitusAMC, a critical technology and services provider for the real estate finance industry, has disclosed a significant data breach discovered on November 12, 2025. The cyberattack compromised corporate information and, more critically, data belonging to its clients' customers, which could include s...

item.title: ShinyHunters Hits Salesforce Again, Breaching Customers via Gainsight App
item.description:
Salesforce has disclosed a significant data breach affecting its customers, stemming from a compromised connection with the Gainsight customer success application. The notorious cybercrime group ShinyHunters, also tracked as UNC6240, has claimed responsibility for the attack, stating they exploited ...

item.title: WEL Companies Investigated for Data Breach Affecting 122,960 People
item.description:
The law firm Schubert Jonckheer & Kolbe LLP is investigating transportation and logistics firm WEL Companies, Inc., following a data breach that compromised the sensitive personal information of 122,960 people. The breach, which exposed names, Social Security numbers, and driver's license numbers, w...

Severity: High

Categories: Data Breach, Policy and Compliance

item.title: Inc Ransom Cripples PA Attorney General's Office, Exfiltrates 5.7 TB of Data
item.description:
The Pennsylvania Office of the Attorney General (OAG) has confirmed it suffered a severe data breach orchestrated by the Inc Ransom ransomware group. The attackers exploited the 'CitrixBleed2' vulnerability (CVE-2025-5777) to gain initial access and subsequently exfiltrated 5.7 terabytes of highly s...

Severity: High

Categories: Ransomware, Data Breach, Vulnerability

item.title: Chicago's St. Anthony Hospital Discloses Data Breach Affecting Over 6,600
item.description:
St. Anthony Hospital in Chicago has reported a data breach that may have exposed the personal and medical information of more than 6,600 patients and staff members. The incident, which was discovered in February 2025, occurred when an unauthorized party gained access to several employee email accoun...

Severity: Medium

Categories: Data Breach, Phishing, Industrial Control Systems

item.title: Vendor Breach Exposes Patient Data at Innovative Physical Therapy
item.description:
Innovative Physical Therapy has notified patients of a data breach that originated from a third-party vendor responsible for practice management. The breach occurred when two vendor employees fell victim to phishing emails, leading to the compromise of their email accounts. Between June 25 and June ...

Severity: Medium

Categories: Data Breach, Supply Chain Attack, Phishing

item.title: Merck Employee Data Breached in Third-Party Vendor Incident
item.description:
Pharmaceutical giant Merck has confirmed a data breach impacting its current and former employees due to a cybersecurity incident at a third-party service provider, Graebel Companies. The breach, which occurred in September 2025, was disclosed on November 17. Exposed data includes sensitive PII such...
